channel.title: Help with a server
channel.description:
Hello, could somebody please help me with this problem, on my server, somebody got on and was killing people in the duel arena and getting their items somehow. anybody have any ideas how to fix or anything? and DFS is already disabled in duel arena. i believe they hit the person after the duel was over, then they died, and the person got their items.
Thanks, f1r3

item.title: Help with a server
item.dc:creator: @xXxSkillerxXx xXxSkillerxXx
item.description:
@xXxSkillerxXx wrote:

it should be the same as your JAD log-in log-out method… lol or find your login method and add something like if player is in duelarena or w.e the fuck it is make it kick them if they log out and back into it

Read full topic

item.title: Help with a server

item.description:
@f1r3 wrote:

ok, well can you tell me? so i can disable stuff?

Read full topic

I am not a coder but I just know how that glitch works. Sorry

item.title: Help with a server
item.dc:creator: @f1r3 f1r3
item.description:
@f1r3 wrote:

ok, thanks but, help me. because i tried everything i could think of, xlogging after killing them, etc and nothing is helping me figure it out…

Read full topic

item.title: Help with a server
item.dc:creator: @RampageDesigns RampageDesigns
item.description:
@RampageDesigns wrote:

Make it if they disconnect while in the Duel Arena or anywhere near it it like teleports them to home or somewhere not in the arena

Read full topic

item.title: Help with a server
item.dc:creator: @f1r3 f1r3
item.description:
@f1r3 wrote:

ok, i have made it so you can’t trade, follow or start duels while in the arena, but somehow people are doing this, somebody that it happened to told me it had something to do with xlogging, but we still haven’t found it out.

Read full topic

item.title: Help with a server
item.dc:creator: @RampageDesigns RampageDesigns
item.description:
@RampageDesigns wrote:

Have you disabled the ability to log off in the duel arena. If yes then they can be x logging and ending up in the duel arena. Then the server will not register they are in a duel and ta-daa they are DFS glithcing. Just make it anytime they login and are in the duel arena area they go to a specific coordinate outside the arena.

Read full topic
